metadata.title: 5 Things To Know: June 20, 2025
metadata.description: CNBC’s Andrew Ross Sorkin reports on the 5 things to know on June 20, 2025.

transcript.full_text: Welcome back to Squad Box 5. Uh things to know ahead of today's opening bell. Let's tell you what's going on here. President Trump saying he's going to decide within the next two weeks whether the US will get involved in the Middle East conflict. Iran's foreign minister set to meet the foreign ministers of Britain, France and Germany. That's going to happen in Switzerland today. Meantime, Softbank looking to partner with Taiwan semiconductor to construct a trillion dollar industrial complex. That's in Arizona and they're going to be trying to build robots and artificial intelligence there. That's according to a Bloomberg report. Meantime, Microsoft considering halting negotiations with Open AI about the future of their partnership. That's if the two sides can't agree on some key issues like the size of Microsoft's future stake in Open AI. and that's from the Financial Times. Meantime, a report saying Microsoft now planning to cut several thousand jobs. That's just going to be in the next several weeks in sales and some other teams. And a SpaceX Starship rocket exploded at the Starbase facility in Texas. That happened on Wednesday during a routine testing in preparation for a launch on social media. SpaceX described it as a major anomaly and said all personnel are safe and accounted for. Elon Musk also responding on his platform X writing quote, just a scratch. Just a scratch. That's funny. Well, not funny but uh when you look at that.

analysis.summary: This broadcast from Squad Box 5 provides an overview of various significant developments across geopolitics, technology, and business ahead of the day's opening bell. Geopolitically, President Trump is expected to decide within the next two weeks whether the United States will intervene in the Middle East conflict. Concurrently, Iran's foreign minister is scheduled to meet with his counterparts from Britain, France, and Germany in Switzerland today to discuss international matters. In the technology sector, Softbank is reportedly in talks with Taiwan Semiconductor to collaborate on building a trillion-dollar industrial complex in Arizona. This ambitious project aims to focus on the development of robots and artificial intelligence, according to a Bloomberg report. Meanwhile, Microsoft is said to be considering pausing its negotiations with OpenAI due to unresolved disagreements concerning key issues, specifically the size of Microsoft's future stake in the AI company, as reported by the Financial Times. Further news regarding Microsoft indicates that the company plans to implement several thousand job cuts across its sales and other teams within the coming weeks. Additionally, a recent incident involved a SpaceX Starship rocket, which exploded during routine testing at the Starbase facility in Texas on Wednesday. While SpaceX characterized the event as a 'major anomaly' on social media, they confirmed that all personnel remained safe. Elon Musk, CEO of SpaceX, downplayed the incident on his platform X, humorously remarking, 'just a scratch.'

key_points.text: Welcome to Squad Box 5 segment.
Segment provides information ahead of today's opening bell.
President Trump is set to decide on US involvement in the Middle East conflict.
US involvement in Middle East conflict is the subject of Trump's decision.
Trump's decision expected within the next two weeks.
Iran's foreign minister is scheduled to meet with international counterparts.
Foreign ministers of Britain, France, and Germany are involved in the meeting.
The meeting location is Switzerland.
The meeting is scheduled for today.
Softbank is exploring a partnership.
The partnership is with Taiwan Semiconductor.
The goal is to construct a trillion dollar industrial complex.
The industrial complex will be located in Arizona.
A focus of the complex is building robots.
Another focus of the complex is artificial intelligence development.
Information on the Softbank partnership is from a Bloomberg report.
Microsoft is considering halting negotiations.
The negotiations are with Open AI.
The potential halt in negotiations is due to disagreement on key issues.
A specific key issue is the size of Microsoft's future stake in Open AI.
Information on Microsoft/OpenAI negotiations is from the Financial Times.
Microsoft is planning job cuts.
Several thousand jobs are planned to be cut.
The job cuts are expected in the next several weeks.
The sales team is among those affected by Microsoft job cuts.
Other Microsoft teams will also be affected by job cuts.
A SpaceX Starship rocket exploded.
The explosion occurred at the Starbase facility.
The Starbase facility is in Texas.
The explosion happened on Wednesday.
The incident occurred during routine testing.
The testing was in preparation for a launch.
SpaceX described the incident as a 'major anomaly' on social media.
SpaceX stated all personnel were safe.
SpaceX stated all personnel were accounted for.
Elon Musk responded to the incident on his platform X.
Elon Musk's quote was 'just a scratch'.

timeline_events.event_description: President Trump is expected to decide within the next two weeks whether the US will get involved in the Middle East conflict.
Iran's foreign minister is set to meet the foreign ministers of Britain, France, and Germany in Switzerland today.
Microsoft is planning to cut several thousand jobs in sales and other teams in the next several weeks.
A SpaceX Starship rocket exploded at the Starbase facility in Texas on Wednesday during routine testing.

temporal_patterns.description: Routine market update and news briefing occurring daily, specifically before the opening bell.
temporal_patterns.significance: Establishes a regular cadence for news delivery related to market activity.

temporal_patterns.description: A future decision timeline for President Trump regarding US involvement in the Middle East conflict, expected within a two-week period.
temporal_patterns.significance: Defines a specific window for a significant geopolitical decision.

temporal_patterns.description: Corporate planning for job cuts by Microsoft, projected to occur over several weeks in the near future.
temporal_patterns.significance: Indicates a short-term, phased reduction in workforce.

temporal_patterns.description: A sequence of events related to SpaceX Starship: routine testing leading up to a launch. The explosion is an interruption to this typical progression.
temporal_patterns.significance: Highlights the multi-stage process of rocket development and testing, and how an anomaly can disrupt it.
temporal_patterns.timespan: Ongoing (testing phase), with a specific event 'on Wednesday'
